answer:
In BC, most pharmacists can provide a variety of vaccines (to persons 5 years of age and older), including the Tetanus and Diphtheria (Td) Vaccine. Contact your local pharmacy to get the Td vaccine.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## In BC, most pharmacists can provide a variety of vaccines (to persons 5 years of age and older), including the Tetanus and Diphtheria (Td) Vaccine.


## Contact your local pharmacy to get the Td vaccine.

Immunization Nurse
question: Can tetanus shots be administered by a pharmacist?
